tempDir.description: Path to temporary directory (-T).  Written to by both the extension and the OpenEdge test execution process.

importOpenedgeProjectJson.description: Import the propath and database connection settings from 'openedge-project.json' possible.

openedgeProjectProfile.description: The profile to use from 'openedge-project.json'.  Only used when 'importOpenedgeProjectJson' is true.

options.description: Options passed to the OE test runner via the 'ablunit.json' file.  Set to null to prevent the creation of 'ablunit.json' or related args passed to the command line.

filename.description: Output filename for test results.  If the value does not end with '.xml' it will be appended.

format.description: Output file extension(s) for results output.  'xml' is required and the default value.  'json' is optional.  The ABLUnit Test Runner VSCode extension performs the xml=>json conversion.

writeJson.description: Write a JSON file containing the parsed results data.  The file will be written to the same directory as `results.xml`.

profiler.description: Options passed to the OE test runner via `-profile <options-file>`.  Set to null to prevent the creation of the options file or args passed to the command line.

enabled.description: Enable the profiler by passing `-profile <options-file>` to the OE test runner.

coverage.description: Enable code coverage logging by the profiler.

description.default: VSCode Test Run - ABLUnit Test Runner
description.description: Description outputted as header information by the `PROFILER` system handle.

filename.description: Filepath where profiler data is written by the `PROFILER` system handle.  When the value is a directory a filename of 'prof.out' will be used.

listings.description: Include source code listings in the profiler output.  Output directory: `"{tempDir}/listings"`

statistics.description: Include statistics in the profiler output.

traceFilter.description: Filter for tracing.  See OpenEdge documentation for details.

tracing.description: Include tracing in the profiler output.

writeJson.description: Write a JSON file containing the parsed profiler data.  The file will be written to the same directorye `filename` property.

xrefThrowError.description: Throw an error if xref file is not found

command.description: Options related to the command line executable

executable.description: Program to execute.  Typically an OpenEdge executable, but could be something like `ant` or another script to launch your test suite.

progressIni.description: Windows only. Path to ini configuration file. Appended to test run execution with command line arguments: `-basekey INI -basename <progressIni>`.  Set to "null" to disable.

additionalArgs.description: Additional args passed to the command line.
